name: Peppery Ginger Cider
description: This warm cocktail is spiked with bourbon and ginger liqueur. Cracked black pepper underscores the ginger's subtle burn.
recipeIngredient: 3 ounces ginger liqueur, such as Domaine de Canton

recipeInstructions.text: Bring cider and bourbon to a simmer in small saucepan. Stir in ginger liqueur and add lemon juice to taste. Divide cherries between 2 heatproof glasses or mugs and pour in cider combination. Sprinkle with pepper and serve immediately.
